```{r}
library("car")
library("marfx")
library("dplyr")

mod <- lm(prestige ~ education + income + type, data = Duncan)

#postsim(mod)
#postsim(mod)
#postsimev(mod)
#postsimy(mod)

data1 <- Duncan %>%
  group_by(type) %>%
  summarize(education = mean(education),
            income = mean(income))
data2 <-
  Duncan %>% 
  group_by(type) %>%
  summarize(education = mean(education),
            income = mean(income) + 1)
mod_pfx <- partialfx(mod, data1 = data1, data2 = data2)
mod_apf <- avg_partialfx(mod, data1 = data1, data2 = data2)

mod2 <- lm(prestige ~ (education + income + type) ^ 2, data = Duncan)

marfx(mod2, "income")
marfx(mod2, "education")
marfx(mod2, "type", "wc")
avg_marfx(mod2, "education")

```
